user.title: LOQED configuration
user.description:
Please enter the local host-name or ip-address of the Bridge and visit https://app.loqed.com/API-Config and:

  • Create an API-key: [add new api-key]
  • Get the [Key] value in fill in beneath
  • Get the [Local Key ID] and fill in beneath
  • Get the [Authentication Key (base64)] from the Outgoing Webhooks via LOQED Bridge and fill in in bridgeKey

data.name: Name of this lock, e.g. frontdoor
data.bkey: Authentication Key from Outgoing webhooks via Loqed Bridge
data.internal_url: Internal HASS URL to be used by the loqed-webhook in the local network.
